str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To begin. Middle voice of archo; to commence.
(a) I say, speak; I mean, mention, tell, (b) I call, name, especially in the pass., (c) I tell, command.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Singular
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To teach, direct, admonish. A prolonged form of a primary verb dao; to teach.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A street, public square, broad way. Feminine of platus; a wide 'plat' or 'place', i.e. Open square.
